summary: This is a comprehensive background investigation report on Scott Borgerson, generated on December 6, 2019. It compiles data from multiple sources including vehicle registrations, corporate filings, utility records, and voter registrations to detail his addresses, business affiliations, associates, and relatives. The report appears to be part of a broader investigative effort, possibly related to financial or network analysis.

keyFacts: The report is a detailed background investigation on Scott Borgerson, generated on December 6, 2019.
Scott Borgerson is associated with multiple businesses including Cargometrics Technologies LLC, Placerisk LLC, Globalflows Inc., Hopley Yeaton LLC, and the Institute for Global Maritime Studies Inc.
A vehicle registration links Borgerson to an address in Boston, MA (02108) from September 2016 to November 2019.
The report compiles data from various sources including Experian, TransUnion, vehicle records, corporate filings, and utility listings.
